forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and clouds mixed. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 64F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and light rain after midnight. Low 11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain later at night. Low 51F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low near 10C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 50F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 56F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 48F. WSW winds shifting to SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
